overview: Rosello's penis tells him what to do. He ends up on death row for sexual crimes against society and nature. Sexy journalist and closet cock-fiend Katie Windham is the only one who believes in his innocence. Now, it's a race against time as she tries to gain him his freedom.
tagline: Hard cock becomes hard copy in a twisted thriller that will keep you on the edge of you cum-drenched seat!
title: Kill For Thrills
